text: Roland Johansson (15 February 1909 - 11 November 1979) was a Swedish swimmer. He competed in the men's 100 metre backstroke event at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1909 births Category:1979 deaths Category:Swedish male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Sweden Category:Swimmers at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:People from Norrköping Category:Male backstroke swimmers
title: Roland Johansson (swimmer)
